title: Tadej Pogačar, Remco Evenepoel Set for Thrilling Rematch Saturday as New World Champion Debuts Rainbow Jersey
content:
Both riders are chasing their first victory in the Giro Dell’Emilia, but a three time winner will also be there.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar, Remco Evenepoel Set for Thrilling Rematch Saturday as New World Champion Debuts Rainbow Jersey on Velo.
author: sstokes
